title: Sell Bourbon
metaDescription: Sell your bourbon collection directly to Proof Cellars. We buy allocated releases, limited editions, and collectible American whiskey. No fees.
heroSubhead: We buy bourbon directly - from single allocated bottles to full collections.
introParagraph: Whether you have a single bottle of allocated bourbon or a collection of limited releases, we provide direct offers with no consignment fees. Our process is straightforward: submit photos and details, receive an offer typically within one business day, and get paid after we receive and verify your bottles.
whatWeBuy: Van Winkle family (Old Rip, Lot B, 15, 20, 23 year)
George T. Stagg and Stagg Jr.
Other allocated and collectible American whiskey
whatWeDoNotBuy: Common shelf bourbons widely available at retail
Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
photoChecklist: Front label showing brand, expression, and age statement
Back label with any lot or batch codes
Capsule and seal showing it is intact
Fill level visible against a light source
Original box or packaging if available
conditionFactors: Fill level is critical - bottles should be at or near original fill
Seal integrity matters - intact seals with no signs of tampering
Label condition affects value - tears, stains, or fading reduce offers
Original packaging (boxes, tubes, bags) adds value when present
Storage conditions - bottles stored properly maintain better value
Tax stamps and lot codes help verify authenticity and dating
pricingFactors: Brand reputation and rarity of the specific expression
Release year and batch number when applicable
Completeness of original packaging and paperwork

faqs.question: What bourbon brands do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy allocated and collectible bourbon from distilleries including Buffalo Trace (Van Winkle, BTAC, Weller, Blanton's, Stagg), Four Roses, Michter's, Willett, and others. Contact us with your specific bottles.

faqs.question: Do you buy common bourbon like Maker's Mark or Buffalo Trace?
faqs.answer: We focus on allocated, limited edition, and collectible bourbon. Standard expressions widely available at retail typically do not meet our buying criteria.

faqs.question: How do I get an offer for my bourbon?
faqs.answer: Submit photos and a bottle list through our Get an Offer form, or text photos directly to 213-770-9463. We typically respond within one business day.

faqs.question: Does the original box matter?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original boxes, tubes, and packaging add value for many collectible bourbons. Include photos of any packaging you have.

faqs.question: What condition issues disqualify a bottle?
faqs.answer: Opened bottles, compromised seals, significant leakage, and severe damage typically disqualify bottles. Minor cosmetic issues usually reduce value but do not disqualify.

faqs.question: How long does the process take?
faqs.answer: We provide offers within one business day. If you accept, we coordinate shipping or drop-off, then issue payment after inspection. The full process typically takes one to two weeks.

faqs.question: Can I sell bourbon from any state?
faqs.answer: We can only purchase where legally permitted. After reviewing your submission, we will confirm whether we can proceed based on your location.

faqs.question: Do you charge any fees?
faqs.answer: No. We make direct offers with no seller fees, no consignment commissions, and no hidden costs.
